mapper.select:
select count(*) from hdg_battery_cell_format
and cell_model LIKE concat('%', #{cellModel}, '%')
and cell_mfr LIKE concat('%', #{cellMfr}, '%')

select * from hdg_battery_cell_format
and cell_model LIKE concat('%', #{cellModel}, '%')
and cell_mfr LIKE concat('%', #{cellMfr}, '%')
order by id desc limit #{beginIndex}, #{rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hdg_battery_cell_format( cell_model_id, cell_mfr, cell_model, cell_format_name, nominal_cap, min_nominal_cap, max_nominal_cap, chg_cut_vol, nominal_vol, min_chg_temp, max_chg_temp, min_dsg_temp, max_dsg_temp, ac_resistance, min_ac_resistance, max_ac_resistance, resilience_vol, min_resilience_vol, max_resilience_vol, static_vol, min_static_vol, max_static_vol, circle, min_circle, max_circle, barcode_rule, chg_rate, chg_current, chg_time, max_continue_chg_current, max_continue_dsg_current, dsg_cut_vol, memo, operator, create_time ) VALUES ( #{cellModelId}, #{cellMfr}, #{cellModel}, #{cellFormatName}, #{nominalCap}, #{minNominalCap}, #{maxNominalCap}, #{chgCutVol}, #{nominalVol}, #{minChgTemp}, #{maxChgTemp}, #{minDsgTemp}, #{maxDsgTemp}, #{acResistance}, #{minAcResistance}, #{maxAcResistance}, #{resilienceVol}, #{minResilienceVol}, #{maxResilienceVol}, #{staticVol}, #{minStaticVol}, #{maxStaticVol}, #{circle}, #{minCircle}, #{maxCircle}, #{barcodeRule}, #{chgRate}, #{chgCurrent}, #{chgTime}, #{maxContinueChgCurrent}, #{maxContinueDsgCurrent}, #{dsgCutVol}, #{memo}, #{operator}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update hdg_battery_cell_format set cell_model_id = #{cellModelId}, cell_mfr = #{cellMfr}, cell_model = #{cellModel}, cell_format_name = #{cellFormatName}, nominal_cap = #{nominalCap}, min_nominal_cap = #{minNominalCap}, max_nominal_cap = #{maxNominalCap}, chg_cut_vol = #{chgCutVol}, nominal_vol = #{nominalVol}, min_chg_temp = #{minChgTemp}, max_chg_temp = #{maxChgTemp}, min_dsg_temp = #{minDsgTemp}, max_dsg_temp = #{maxDsgTemp}, ac_resistance = #{acResistance}, min_ac_resistance = #{minAcResistance}, max_ac_resistance = #{maxAcResistance}, resilience_vol = #{resilienceVol}, min_resilience_vol = #{minResilienceVol}, max_resilience_vol = #{maxResilienceVol}, static_vol = #{staticVol}, min_static_vol = #{minStaticVol}, max_static_vol = #{maxStaticVol}, circle = #{circle}, min_circle = #{minCircle}, max_circle = #{maxCircle}, barcode_rule = #{barcodeRule}, chg_rate = #{chgRate}, chg_current = #{chgCurrent}, chg_time = #{chgTime}, max_continue_chg_current = #{maxContinueChgCurrent}, max_continue_dsg_current = #{maxContinueDsgCurrent}, dsg_cut_vol = #{dsgCutVol}, memo = #{memo}, operator = #{operator} where id = #{id}
